description:
Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaigun Shutsudou: Nerawareta Mugiwara no Ichimi
Le soldat de la Marine entrent en action ! L`équipage du Chapeau de Paille pris pour cible !
The Navy Has Set Out! The Straw Hats in Danger!
Дозор начинает действовать! Цель – пираты Мугивары!
تبدأ البحريّة بالتّحرّك! الخطر يُحدق بطاقم قبّعة القشّ!
海軍出動 狙われた麦わらの一味
